com.github.privacystreams.location

Class GeolocationOperators

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.privacystreams.location.GeolocationOperators

  • @PSOperatorWrapper
public class GeolocationOperators
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class to access geolocation-related operators

      • inCircle

        public static Function<Item,java.lang.Boolean> inCircle(java.lang.String latLngField,
                                                        double centerLat,
                                                        double centerLng,
                                                        double radius)
        Check if the coordinates specified by a LatLng field is a location in an given circular region.
        Parameters:
        latLngField - the LatLng field to check
        centerLat - latitude of the center of the area
        centerLng - longitude of the center of the area
        radius - radius of the region, in meters
        Returns:
        the function

      • inSquare

        public static Function<Item,java.lang.Boolean> inSquare(java.lang.String latLngField,
                                                        double minLat,
                                                        double minLng,
                                                        double maxLat,
                                                        double maxLng)
        Check if the coordinates specified by a LatLng field is a location in an given square region.
        Parameters:
        latLngField - the LatLng field to check
        minLat - the minimum latitude of the region
        minLng - the minimum longitude of the region
        maxLat - the maximum latitude of the region
        maxLng - the maximum longitude of the region
        Returns:
        the function

      • distort

        public static Function<Item,LatLng> distort(java.lang.String latLngField,
                                            double radius)
        Distort the coordinates value of a field and return the distorted coordinates. The distorted coordinates is an instance of `LatLng` class.
        Parameters:
        latLngField - the coordinates field to distort
        radius - the distance to distort, in meters
        Returns:
        the function

      • distanceBetween

        public static Function<Item,java.lang.Double> distanceBetween(java.lang.String latLngField1,
                                                              java.lang.String latLngField2)
        Get the distance between two locations (in meters).
        Parameters:
        latLngField1 - the first location
        latLngField2 - the second location
        Returns:
        the function
